body_html:
Yes, you can use the Dataset API to train Keras models. The standard tf.keras workflow would likely involve managing data via the Dataset API, building your model via the Keras API, and training it via the Estimator API.
…

body:
Yes, you can use the Dataset API to train Keras models. The standard
tf.keras workflow would likely involve managing data via the Dataset API,
building your model via the Keras API, and training it via the Estimator
API.

On 26 August 2017 at 09:17, bhack <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Will be also an interoperability also with tf.contrib.data.Dataset?
>
> —
